name: Disable Enemies to Reveal Enemies (SuperBiasedMan)
description:
A game made with Pico8 for the Idle Thumbs forum community's Wizard Jam 5.

Hunt through the level, searching for the visible enemy to disable, while avoiding the invisible enemies that are hunting you. Disabling an enemy reveals your next target, until no enemies are left and you can descend the stairs to the next level.

Sound is important, it's the only way to detect the invisible enemies!

Arrows to move
Z to whistle and locate guards
Z/X to navigate menus
